Package abdcelik.Trees

Class BinarySearchTreeWithRotate<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>

java.lang.Object
abdcelik.Trees.BinaryTree<E>
abdcelik.Trees.BinarySearchTree<E>
abdcelik.Trees.BinarySearchTreeWithRotate<E>
Type Parameters:
E - The type of data stored. Must be a Comparable type
All Implemented Interfaces:
SearchTree<E>, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
RedBlackTree
public class BinarySearchTreeWithRotate<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
extends BinarySearchTree<E>
Extends the BinarySearchTree by adding the rotate operations. Rotation will change the balance of a search tree while preserving the search tree property. Used as a common base for self-balancing trees.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected BinaryTree.Node<E> rotateLeft​(BinaryTree.Node<E> root)
    Method to perform a left rotation pre: root is the root of a binary search tree post: root.right is the root of a binary search tree root.right.right is raised one level root.right.left does not change levels root.left is lowered one level the new root is returned
    protected BinaryTree.Node<E> rotateRight​(BinaryTree.Node<E> root)
    Method to perform a right rotation pre: root is the root of a binary search tree post: root.left is the root of a binary search tree root.left.left is raised one level root.left.right does not change levels root.right is lowered one level the new root is returned

  • Method Details

    • rotateRight

      protected BinaryTree.Node<E> rotateRight​(BinaryTree.Node<E> root)
      Method to perform a right rotation pre: root is the root of a binary search tree post: root.left is the root of a binary search tree root.left.left is raised one level root.left.right does not change levels root.right is lowered one level the new root is returned
      Parameters:
      root - The root of the binary tree to be rotated
      Returns:
      The new root of the rotated tree
